"Back"?  Their actual claims to Taiwan are thin and consist of a lot of invented history.  Through much of its history Taiwan was dominated by native people who are Austronesian, not East Asian or Chinese.   One of their tribal languages is distantly related to native Hawaiian from that great diaspora across the Pacific.   Farmers from Fujian province were settled in Taiwan in the 1620's by Dutch colonists who thought them more tractable and civil than the Taiwan natives.  The last pretender to the Ming dynasty fled to Taiwan with an army and kicked out the Dutch.   He died prematurely and an army from China defeated his son and took control.   Taiwan was governed from China until 1895 when it was ceded to Japan as minor in value after the loss of the 1895 war.   It was part of Japan till 1945 when the winners awarded it to the government of China at the time.  

They in turn lost the civil war with the Communists and fled to Taiwan, setting up Chang's Nationalist, Nanjing government there in 1949.   The Taipei government of Taiwan descends from that government, but the government has reformed and evolved and early on had reforms imposed on it.  AFAIK, the US regarded Chang as a crook and Mao as a monster.   Both views seem correct.   The Communists in Beijing have never run Taiwan; it's been run from China for 4 years in the last 105.  Taiwan is part of the Chinese Culture Area, but evolved away from China, and is now the only democracy in that history.

Lasers work great as long as it's not cloudy or worse yet (foggy). Then they are useless!

Both space-based and ground-based lasers can be defeated by weather!

There are atmospheric hypersonic missiles that cannot be hit by ground-based lasers on a cloudy day and hypersonic cruise-missiles that cannot be hit by space-based lasers on a cloudy day.

There are seasons in certain parts of the world where laser based missile defense would be useless for most of the season.

That means we need anti hypersonic missile technology besides laser-based missile defense. We need a back-up or better primary system.
We have nuclear weapons already in every major city in the world. We do not need a delivery system. Delivery systems are for show and distraction.
